name: Idle Champions: Mind Flayer Dark Urge Theme Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion The Dark Urge (if you don't already have them) Mind Flayer Dark Urge Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for The Dark Urge 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold The Dark Urge Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards
